Interface AccountAsyncOperation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ContextAware
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountAsyncTemplate

    @ApiAudience.Public
 @ApiStability.Unstable
public interface AccountAsyncOperation
extends ContextAware

      • importKey

        default ResultOrErrorFuture<ServerManagedAccount> importKey(EncryptedPrivateKey encryptedKey,
                                                            java.lang.String password)
        Import an encrypted private key asynchronously. An password is used to decrypt private key passed by and store private key encrypted in a server.
        Parameters:
        encryptedKey - an encrypted private key
        password - password to decrypt encrypted private key and store encrypted in a remote storage
        Returns:
        future of account result or error

      • importKey

        ResultOrErrorFuture<ServerManagedAccount> importKey(EncryptedPrivateKey encryptedKey,
                                                    java.lang.String oldPassword,
                                                    java.lang.String newPassword)
        Import an encrypted private key asynchronously. An oldPassword is used to decrypt private key passed by and an newPassword is used to store private key encrypted in a server.
        Parameters:
        encryptedKey - an encrypted private key
        oldPassword - old password to decrypt encrypted private key
        newPassword - new password to store in a remote storage
        Returns:
        future of account result or error

      • exportKey

        ResultOrErrorFuture<EncryptedPrivateKey> exportKey(Authentication authentication)
        Export an encrypted private key of account asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        authentication - account authentication
        Returns:
        future of an encrypted private key
